alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Newton; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 25 at 2:12AM CDT until October 25 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tyler County in southeastern Texas... Southwestern Newton County in southeastern Texas... Northeastern Hardin County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Jasper County in southeastern Texas... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 211 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mt. Union to 6 miles northwest of Buna to near Weiss Bluff, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Silsbee, Kirbyville, Call, Evadale, Buna, Caney Head, Weiss Bluff, Gist, Trout Creek, Magnolia Springs, Old Salem, Mt. Union, Wrights Settlement, Devils Pocket and Bleakwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
